google-runtime-operator.description:
Description

Finds overloads of unary
operator
&
.

https://google.github.io/styleguide/cppguide.html#Operator_Overloading

Corresponding cpplint.py check name:
runtime/operator
.
google-runtime-operator.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
